content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed when a very bright object caught my eye and made me get up to look out the window.  first saw a light bright enough to be a low flying commercial airplane, but the light was not traveling a straight line like a plane, instead it was hovering and rapidly dashing from one point to another with no pattern, just random darting side to side, stalling then redirecting, sometimes moving upward or downward.  there was another planet behaving similarly - the red planet in orion's bow.  i reported to pickens county sheriff's office but they had no interest.  i also reported to ufo hotline out of oregon.  he called back to tell me i only saw stars, but today, i was told about the cow mutilations that took place at cooper's farm in hall county, ga over the weekend, and hall county was very much in line with the area i was viewing.  i live on a 3,000 ft elevation mountain (tally mtn) and i can see all the way to atl from my mountain.  it was a very very clear night when i saw this activity.  i never lost site of the objects/hovering stars, but when i went out in the yard on the phone with my father, they stopped moving and jerking and lost brightness and intensity and returned back into the normal constellation appearance and were still.
content.summary: Darting & looping frantic stars in sky forming planets in orion's belt constellation

content.detailedDescription: I was on my driveway in commack,ny and saw and orange/red glowing object in the sky (far east of my home). i first thought is was a plane on fire, but realized it was too large for that.  the color was astonishing.  the object moved west in the sky and i immediately got my wife as a witness. the object then began to move north and then seemed to stop and hover for about 15 seconds.  it then turned and began moving away in an easterly direction and quickly vanished.  when it turned to move away, the color had stopped and the object appeared white (as a star in the sky)
content.summary: Orange/red glowing object moving forward, hovering, and turning to exit

content.detailedDescription:
Prelude info: i am 47 years old and, as a soldier, spent many months in the deserts of white sands, n.M., death valley (ft. irwin, ca.) and turkey as well back in the 80's. i've spent many hours looking up into the stars and with little to absolutely no light pollution to obscure the dimmest of stars.
 i've been star gazing all my life and always liked searching for satellites crossing my view.
 something i've noticed, which brings me to my report, is the fact that there are now "things" going on that i never noticed back then. not that they did not happen, it's just that it seems to be something new and increasing.
 what i mean and, simultaneously, my newest experience ( as all of my experiences). the "satellite like" objects that traverse our space. not our regular, man made satellites but ones that stop, change course and light up seconds at a time and then disappear.
 i just saw again, on the morning of 10/06/2010 an object, which looked at first like a man made satellite but it crossed the sky in less than one minute! our real satellites take 7-8 minutes and never change course.
 this is something i never saw years ago but now, is virtually a daily thing.
these objects stop, disappear and send "morse code" like signals in the form of flashes. whereby, others flash back.
 i just wanted to state that i am aware we are being watched and visited. i am not afraid and i accept it. i find it exciting. i have never experienced any personal encounters. no black triangles hovering, no disc with lights. just these high altitude craft. perhaps because we live on the gulf coast and there is little of interest here for them. i don't have a very good view except due east over galveston bay. maybe there is more activity closer to houston.
 i would really love to see one closer.
content.summary: Flashing "satellite like" objects

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dogs out in my backyard then i look up at the sky and this light blue flare, or flash appears in the sky and spreads into an oval and like a firework it burst out but just disappear's then it ends with a shooting star like tail. again to be more specific it was an oval shaped flare that was all blue no spaces then disappeared and ended with a shooting star-like tail. i thought this object was a u.F.O but then i thought it was a shooting star, but shooting stars don't flare at the beginning of they're appearance. when it was active the u.F.O was going down, i also noticed that it was seconds before the sun came up. my feeling's were going crazy, i was scared, nervous, and excited i went inside to tell my mom and i told her and she was in shock too. i finally faced my fears then went back out-side to feed my dog's (they had no reaction to this event.) i stayed out there to see if i see anything else, but the results i didn't see anything else in the sky.
content.summary: Burst of light that was oval shaped then ended with a shooting star tail

content.detailedDescription: Saw several bright amber/orange lights appear in the sky south of abilene texas. one came on and went out and to the east of that one another one came on and went out. then they came on in pairs, they were very bright orangish color. they came on and went out in the same part of the sky for 15 minutes, no planes in the area ..I saw some planes but these were 100% not planes ...These are the same orange lights that came very frequently earlier this year and last year.
content.summary: Orange lights just like last time

content.detailedDescription: we were fishing on mountain lake one evening early 1990s and when it got dark we looked around the lake and noticed what we thought was a round house.The lights coming from the object were different though greenish and what looked like a television had a beam of light coming out of it that just stopped inside.We did see people with large heads and long arms,only shadowish though.We watched in amazement as we realized they coudlnt have built a round house there in two weeks as we went fishing there almost every weekend.About 2:00am we both had a fish on and hadnt caught anything all night,at which point it was gone.There was a time lapse of app. 2 hours that we do not know what happeneed.I am wondering if it is possible to be hypnotized for the purpose of trying to remember what exactly happened that very strange night.Oh there is no house there.
content.summary: App.75 ft dia windows around the half facing us

content.detailedDescription: The "ifo" had a doom top, flat bottom and bulbous sides. it was hovering at around 1500ft. i was driving southbound on 183 and at first i wrote it off as a plane, until i realized it wasn't moving. by time i exited and return to get a second look, it was gone.
content.summary: Hovering saucer over mopac at 2222

content.detailedDescription: We discussed the fact that there are no stars that bright in that position, south or jupiter and slightly above it's plain.  my wife mentioned that they are planets.  they were slightly different in brightness, one on the left brighter, a little brighter than what saturn would be, but not as bright as venus.  the other a little less bright similar to mar's color but brighter.  after looking at them for a minute or two the one on the right started to dim as if getting farther away, just before it was gone the other did the same and vanished.  balloons?  slim chance but all agreed that "not hardly"  airplane, "no way!"  this happened right at 8:00 just before macbeth came on channel 5.
content.summary: Two bright objects 8 degrees south of jupiter slightly above

content.detailedDescription: I watched a red and blue pulsating object move like a hummingbird for about 1/2 an hour. 2 more similiar objects went into the direction of the object. all of them disappeared behind the trees after 1/2 an hour or so. but i was watching mostly just the one pulsating one for at least 1/2 an hour. it seemed to be hovering, but then also moving like a hummingbird at times. sometimes it moved in a figure eight pattern and sometimes in a circular pattern. i definitely have never seen anything like it before. it was not a satellite, plane, helicopter, star, comet, or weather balloon. the sky was completely clear with no clouds and there was no wind. i watched it outside on my deck. it made me feel, of course, incredibly excited, anxious, awestruck
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Pulsating red and blue lights and moved like a hummingbird

content.detailedDescription:
This morning(oct 06, 2010)one of our drafters and i went out to watch the space station fly over. it was to come over at 6:43am. he asked where we would first see it. so i pointed.
*(wit's name deleted--cms/sg)said, "there it is!". so i looked up to see what he had spotted. it was not the space station, but another ufo (my first sighting was on sept 22, 2010). we watched as it zig-zagged and did circles in the sky, until we lost site of it. freaky!
oh yes, we also watched the space station. it's trajectory was a bit lackluster as compared to what we just saw.
with this being my second sighting it has answered a big question in my mind. however it raises many more. did the guys in the iss see it. i'm sure the government is aware of these objects. why do they not share the information with us? who are they? why are they here? what do they want? are they a threat?
content.summary: Ufo sighting prior to iss sighting

content.detailedDescription: i was walking to my friends house in burleson, tx, to see if he was home. he was not. on my return journey, when i was about halfway back from a .5 mile walk. i looked up at the sky. i noticed something hovering silently. a bright blue glowing object. brightest thing in the sky. i noticed it mainly because it seemed to be moving with me. mimicking the movement of my body as if it was parallelling my path as i was crossing the street. strangely enough, when i looked closer to try and focus on it, it dropped from the sky like a shooting star and disappeared behind the trees on the horizon. i didn't know what to think, about what it was. but it moved downward faster than anything i have ever seen before in my life. it could not have been a star or a meteor, that i am sure of. during the event i felt baffled as i gazed upon it, and disappointed, yet stunned as it vanished out of sight. the oddest thing was its descention. it arched upward before plummitting down, fast, like it did.
content.summary: A bright, neon blue, pulsating light following me in the sky and shortly after i noticed it, it drop faster than a free fall into  the horizon

content.detailedDescription:
I was showing a friend a possible ufo. it had been around for some time and only seemed to appear at night in 1 of 2 places. as we watched it it would move around. so we used the edge of a small pine tree for reference to make sure it wasn't a trick of the eye. sure enough the object moved back and forth in and out of sight(i lined the object up rather closed to the edge of the outline of the tree to get a good reference). it soon started going up and then hooked a 90 degree left. we watched for a time more and saw some other incredible maneuvers. after watching for awhile we started to head back to the porch and i noted a bright star(at the time i thought it to be a bright star that was around in the fall due to it appearing around early august)and we watched it for a minute when my friend noted he thought it may have moved. we watched for a little longer and saw movements. again thinking i may be the dark/eye trickery, so i used another tree and as i would watch and see it start to move my friend would call out the movement he saw and it matched what i was seeing. for another 30 minutes or so we would watch it and back and forth call out what movement we saw just to see if we each saw it. after wanting more proof we called up several friends and had them come over. we all witnessed a moving bright object. one friend had his camera and bi-pod. we set up the camera(note my friend is a photographer using a high end rebel, not an average house hold digi) we took several 30second time lapse pictures and the object would move almost fully across the image. on several images the stream would move in different directions(again on a bi-pod stationary). the camera zoom didnt get close enough and i wanted to try to get a closer look at the image, so we got out the spotting scope are started trying to fine the object. i was able to pin point the object and get a focus on it. once i got a clear look i was shaken. i was able to see the bright light that i was drawn to at first. i was also able to see another 3 lights in a perfect line and a 5th light directly in the middle of the 4 up making a perfect almost equal sided pyramid. me and 5 others all looked at the object and saw the same thing. at one point i watched the object in the scope for about 2 to 3 minutes and during that time it moved from the left to right and out of sight of the scope while turning itself about 90 degrees before i had to readjust to see it again. this isnt the first time i have seen ufos around my area but this is the first time i have been able to get multiple people to see the encounter. to even the playing field i even called a non-believer over who was skeptical and they admitted they were unsure of what they had just witnessed. i have for a few years thought this to be somewhat of a hot spot but until recently announcing such would have been thought crazy. it was an experience for me as for everyone else who witnessed the event. i think by the end of the night the other 3 skeptics were unsure of what they thought and open to anything at that point.

message to admins of the site. feel free to contact me via email for more information or chat.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: 5 lights. 4 on the bottom perfectly spaced and aligned 1 at the top to make a perfect triangle

content.detailedDescription:
At exactly 9:00pm on october 3, 2010 just south of the kennedy space center in viera florida i was in my back yard looking at some aircraft going by when i noticed an object barely visible to the eye hovering in the direction of the kennedy space center. i was able to keep my eyes focused on the object and after about 1 minute the object began moving south/south west in my direction passing over my head picking up speed as it went making no sound at all.

 when the object approached it appeared to be around 10,000 feet up in the shape of an open ended triangle with semitransparent glowing circles on each side { four on one side and three on the other } and the body seemed to be transparent. i hit the object with a very strong light as it went over and still couldn't see a body to the object, then it corrected to the left a bit and headed at a high rate of speed directly south. the triangle was about 100 yards wide and 200 yards from nose to end. 

just a few hours earlier i noticed a 3 weird white colored black-hawks heading towards the kennedy space center. this was unusual because i'm a veteran and the black-hawks were unusual in color and equipment. i fighter hovered high above the black-hawks as if it was guarding them. i thought the president was in town. i now realize my sighting and the earlier incident were connected.
content.summary: Semitransparent v shaped ufo over the kennedy space center

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving in the car on i-270 south in kirkwood when i noticed two bright lights like very bright stars separated in the sky towards the i-44 interchange about a mile or two ahead. the "stars" where quite noticeable and much brighter than any other visible stars. this is the same location where six days before, september 29th, i noticed strange lights in the same area and reported that to mufon.

one "star" appeared twice the size and brightness of the other, though both were at least as bright as the jupiter confluence going on at this time, and they twinkled much more. as i approached the interchange where i exited to i-44 east, the lights stayed in the same relative location but each definitely flashed a few times as i glanced at them while driving, causing me to wonder. they appeared to be southeast of my direction. i lost sight of them due the the surrounding environment while getting onto i-44 and couldn't see them as i started east.

when i came to about the same location as six nights before, i turned a bend and saw two bright "star" lights but this time much closer. the were not in the same relative position in the sky, but were in the same relative position to each other. the brighter object was just to the left of the highway about 15 degrees off the horizon. the dimmer was to the right of the highway at about 30 degrees. they stayed motionless and steady for about a minute but then both then started to move to my right towards the southeast where i had last seen the two similar "stars" at the interchange, and i wondered that these where the same "stars." once the brighter one passed across the highway it started becoming even brighter, appearing to be coming closer and slightly descending. it got to about at least half the size of a full moon before i could see a very small red and green light on each side of the bright shimmering ball of light.

this light quicly got so close that i could no longer glance at it will driving on the interstate highway at the speed limit and i slowed down slightly in the right most lane so that i could lean forward and glance up though the windshield a few times. when i then did this a couple of times, i was at first shocked to see what is a simple depiction i've attached to this report - four distinct lights, two red and two green. the red and green lights were quite brilliant in color, not blinding, but also hard get a good "fix" on. there was a faint white shimmering light that was accentuated around the red and green lights, which were also shimmering themselves. the four lights and their relative sizes and positions where quite discernible though difficult to discern their exact shape, more like small columns of light than spheres of light. i actually laughed when i saw it in that configuration the first glance, thinking it was a joke on the faa. also the red and green lights that i saw until those glances where much smaller and dimmer, when it was almost like the full moon in white brightness between them. at these few close glances, there was no clear white light source but a dim white sparkling shimmering light about it.

when it passed me i noticed that at least three other cars had slowed down with me, perhaps they saw it too. when i got a little past that i looked in my driver-side rear-view mirror and could see a row of five lights circling back behind me. the there were two larger brighter lights with three dimmer lights in a row, dim-bright-dim-bright-dim. these lights followed me at my left side at about 10 degrees over the horizon perhaps for five miles until i exited the highway at laclede station rd. the lights on the craft remained steady but one would flash every one or two seconds, different ones at different times. i exited right and came to a stop light about 100 yards off the highway.

stopping at the light, at about 45 degrees off the horizon i saw a  line of lights in the sky, about the size of a dime. there were five lights in a row, the middle one always red and the others usually white but sometimes green or red at the ends. the end lights would change color every few seconds, but none of the lights flashed nor changed intensity. all these lights also had a shimmer to them. i had the impression this was the second "craft," since i had just last seen the larger row of white lights about 15 seconds before that had been pacing me at the opposite side of the sky. anyway, i turned left at the light and this light seemed to then descend to about 15 degrees over the horizon and get a bit closer. i could easily see it for a few miles staying to my right. it didn't seem to move much more in the sky until i got about 2 miles from my house in st. louis and slowly moved out of sight behind me.

as i had wondered six nights before, and a few nights before those - what's up with these weird mocking lights flying around? personally, knowing about the rumor of public disclosure by the "aliens" later this month, it's something that makes me go "hmmm." yet, has disclosure already come to many, even if the minority?
content.summary: One of two "stars" comes close to car on interstate and changes lighting

content.detailedDescription:
I'm reporting this for my father and his girlfriend who reported this event to me this evening.  

they were outside on her porch the evening of 10/5 in the vicinity of west elementary on the west end of mt. vernon.  they report first seeing what appeared to be a glowing cigar-shaped object hovering almost directly over her home for several minutes.  after several minutes the object quickly disappeared.  following the initial object they report seeing three (3) round or spherical objects fly in which "bounced around" for several more minutes.  reportedly a neighbor came out (or arrived home, i'm not clear) and saw them looking at the sky and asked what they were looking at.  my father's girlfriend directed her to look up at the area they were looking at and tell them what she saw.  apparently she also saw the same 3 objects.  

they report hearing a loud noise associated with the objects, which was also heard in other parts of town up to 2 miles away.  the sound was described as a loud "rhhhhhew rhhhhew" type sound.  after my father returned home he continued to hear the noise and thought it may be coming from a local refinery or roofing plant, but having lived in the area over 60 years does not recall a similar noise.  they speculated the noise may have also been coming from underground.

i'm not clear on the size or distance of the objects, and they were reluctant to make the report themselves.  she (my father's girlfriend) did say that she'd spoke to a local resident who is a ufo enthusiast/investigator (again not sure) who had told her there had been a lot of activity in indiana recently.

i can provide names of the two main witnesses upon request as this is all 2nd hand information to me.
content.summary: Multi-object sighting over mt vernon

content.detailedDescription: I watching tv in bed i got up to open my window and i saw this very bright light in the sky, at first i thought it was a star or maybe a plane stationary in the air. i watched it for about 10 minutes.I just didnt think it was a star or a plane.My mom woke up and i and showed her the light in the sky. all of a sudden we see this huge dark object with bright green and red lights, the lights were flashing around the object moving slowly across the highway with no sound.It was flying lower then a plane. as soon as we seen it we thought it was a ufo! i ran for my cell phone to take a picture unfortunately it didn't take because of the street light outside my house was too bright. i was shocked to see something like this. i was a little nervous not knowing what i was seeing.The sky was very dark so i could not make out the color or shape but i assumed it was round by the way the lights were flashing around it. as soon as it passed the bright light in the sky went further away & i lost sight of it.About a minute later a plane flew by going in the same direction as the object.I live off of a highway with alot of trees so i lost sight of the object within a minute or two.
content.summary: Huge object with bright green and red flashing lights flying over the highway in front of my house

content.detailedDescription:
We have been witnessing this for a couple weeks now. sometimes at night and other times i see it when i am leaving for work around 5:30am. it is always in the same spot. the lights are flashing red green and amber. it looks like the lights are moving in a circular motion. sometimes it is very bright and other times it is dim. it is not always there. on monday morning october 4, 2010 i was leaving for work at 5:30am. i noticed the lights. it was the brightest i have ever seen it. i called my boyfriend out to look at it. we watched for 10min. it stayed in the same spot. in that time we saw 2 smaller objects come out from the light and move very slowly to the right of the light. then a few minutes later the light started moving the same way. within seconds another flashing light appeared in the place of the first. then all of a sudden another one appeared above it and that quick they were gone. i can't explain it. my parents, and my boyfriend have witnessed it also. my mom said one morning the light was really long and horizontal and then just disappeared. i have done a lot of research to come up with an answer and can not. i havent heard of anyone else seeing these lights.

i was outside of my house. we were just looking to see if we could see the lights. we have tried to take pictures but it is to far away. we have looked through the telescope and it is fuzzy but you can really see the lights flasing.
content.summary: Red green and amber flashing lights

content.detailedDescription:
Two messages, one at 5:12 pm and one at 5:13 pm, were left on my answering machine thursday (i think the date was august 19). after listening to them many times, i believe they are two different messages, left by two different "voices."

i'm submitting this report and a digital audio recording of the messages because i believe they are connected to ufo sightings i have been experiencing in angel fire, new mexico. a couple of years ago, i recall hearing similar sounds on an internet site (sorry, don't remember when or which site) which described them as being made by extraterrestrials.

the audio recording was made by holding a digital recorder near the answering machine on which the messages were made. i consider the recording to be about 98%-99%% as clear as the original messages (which i have retained on my digital answering machine).

my caller id recorded the phone number, which is not included in this narrative (but which will be given to official investigator). if the reverse-number service i accessed on the internet is correct, the phone calls were made from a land line in southern california.
content.summary: Two "data-alien-voices" telephone messages left on my land-line answering machine

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down ridge road in buford, away from friendship road, headed towards hamilton mill. it was a beautiful day today, not a cloud in the sky. as i was approaching a break in the trees, something shining in the sky caught my eye. my very first reaction was knowing that it was not a plane. as i kept glancing at it for the next 20-30 feet, i found a place to pull over. it wasn't moving. just sitting there hovering in the sky. it looked to be about 200 feet up. my windows were down and cars were driving by, but i couldn't hear any kind of sound out of this object. i sat and watched it for about 20 seconds and then it just disappeared. it didn't fly off or move, just vanished. as i searched the sky for it, i noticed an actual plane going by in roughly the same area and i could hear the plane pass and noticed that the sun wasn't bouncing off of the plane like it was the previous object. i pulled back onto the road and drove to the redlight that was 1/4 of a mile away from where i pulled over, while watching the sky to see if it popped back up. as i got to the redlight, with my eyes on the sky, i noticed something appear out of nowhere further off in the distance directly ahead of me. i sat and watched it. it appeared to be the same object (or another one of the same thing), except it was further away and this time, it moved very slowly to my right for about 5 seconds and then, again, just disappeared. when the light turned green, i made my left hand turn and kept glancing towards the sky. i didn't see anything else on the way home, but i know what i saw and it was a ufo. now, i want to go out tonight and search the stars to see if i can find anything else.
content.summary: Silver metal. longer than it was tall.

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home one night from a social event in the summer with the windows down and the radio off.  i glanced to the left as i was heading east and i noticed a triangular arrangement of still lights over the st. joseph river approximately by martin's landing in elkhart.  i presumed the lights outlined a vessel of some sort but i could not see anything in between the lights.  the shape demarcated by the lights reminded me of an imperial destroyer from star wars.  by the light size and shape it appeared to only be 500-1000 ft above the water.  i noticed there was no loud sound from the object, as i thought maybe it could be a helicopter hovering or similar, but i heard nothing.  the object appeared to be maybe 100-300 ft long.

i did not stop or investigate further as i had to get home and to bed to get up for work early.  i expected to see something about it in the news but never did.  so i am reporting it here.  the month, day, and time are all approximate but not the location.  this occurred east of the dam on the st. joseph river. this was during summer as it was warm outside.  if someone else saw this i hope they correct me on the date.

the object was motionless, the lights were unmoving and not blinking - they were all steady lights.

i felt nothing special other than some curiosity and thought to myself, "i don't know what this is so to me it is an unidentified flying object".

as i drove down the street the increasing number of trees obscured my view and i no longer saw the object.
content.summary: Triangular ufo over st. joseph river near martin's landing dock

content.detailedDescription: I was observing a very strange looking cloud in the evening sky in ainsworth, ia that wasn't moving. afterwards when i looked at the photos it looked liked this small ufo came shooting out of it. i'm not sure what it was but i've never seen a cloud like this and i have taken a lot of weather photo's. i may be nothing but i wanted to post it just in case someone else has noticed anything in the area besides corn and cows. *(wit's initials deleted--cms/sg).
content.summary: Captured small round ufo near strange looking cloud

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog when i spotted an object moving slowly south at almost exactly 7 pm on october 5. being a mufon field investigator, i frequently check the skies for unusual objects. this object was moving very slowly with no sound and had no observable navigation lights or wings. the siding was at sunset that the object was high enough to be in sunlight. the object appeared to be a double sphere with a mirror like metallic surface. it was at about 30��� from the horizon just above the trees behind my house. i observed the object for about 30 seconds trying to determine what it was and could not. i ran for my house which was about 100 yards away to retrieve my video camera, but when i returned the object had disappeared. it first appeared about 10 miles east of pinnacle mountain heading directly toward the city of little rock. if it continued on its course it would have passed over the city of little rock very shortly after 7 pm. the only thing that i can think of other than a ufo that might have presented itself in this manner would be two mylar balloons. there was no surface wind to make the balloons move, but i have no idea if there were wins at altitude. i had no reference points for determining altitude, distance, or size. i had no reaction to the object other than surprise.
content.summary: I double sphere with a mirror like metallic surface

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my back yard with my wife, looking up at the sky a giant craft flew quickly and silently over us, about 200 feet above. we looked in amazement as it headed east into the sky. shocked, we watched it dissipate. over the course of the next week and continuing this day, there are lights in the sky. when i flash my flashlight up at it, it flashes back, it moves around not on a flat plane, more scattered. i know what it was, i have seen many many more in my lifetime. i was perplexed.
content.summary: Ufo/light sighting in the sky over san mateo

content.detailedDescription: Was out in the back yard with my dog around 730 mountain time. and as i always do look up at the sky looking to the west. and i see a star like object moving across the sky (north)in a straight line . at first i thought it was a satellite. but when it never showed up on the other side of the tree i knew something was up. i kept looking for it, and then saw the same type of object come out of no where going south opposite direction. it appeared to be lower in the sky. and then that object just vanished. i went out the next night at the same time and was looking to see if indeed it was a satellite and saw nothing.
content.summary: Star like object moving across sky

content.detailedDescription:
Very early one morning last month, my husband called me to the front balcony of our country home very excitedly... "come and see this!!!" he shouted urgently, so i got out of bed to see what the fuss was about.  

in the sky we observed what looked like a triangular-shaped object hovering on the horizon, moving in small, erratic motions, back and forth within a small radius, making what appeared to be a very slow descent upon the horizon.  after about 10 minutes, it disappeared entirely behind the mountain: our cottage looks out onto a lake that is flanked at every side by the gently rolling laurentian hills. 

it was very difficult to determine the precise shape of the object in question, as this particular detail was obscured by numerous twinkling blue and red lights. (it occured to me just now that i should have tried to count their number, but i did not.  the lights were flashing in no repetitive pattern that i could discern.)

i described the object as triangular in shape for the twinkling lights, at the very least, were arranged upon the object in a loose, morphing triangle of sorts.  i viewed the object with binoculars but in terms of structure i was unable to discern anything but a shadow with decidedly indistinct edges, perhaps on account of the many flashing lights, whose shape appeared to be shifting. 

my husband and i agreed that we had never before seen any aircraft behave in this manner.  it certainly was not a helicopter or airplane. there was no sound coming from the object that we could discern.

i am only reporting this incident because of news report that made the local headlines in nearby montreal last weekend.  a very respected obstetrician/gynecologist was coming home from the hospital late one evening and reported a strange sight in the sky.  i was astonished to discover that he appeared to be describing the object we saw to a tee! i am convinced by his description that we may have seen the same object, or perhaps two very similar objects, in close geophysical proximity, in the span of a month. (my cottage is about an hour's drive away from montreal.)  here is a link to the story:

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]

i realize i probably should have reported this earlier (this would have given my sighting greater credibility no doubt!) but it didn't even occur to me to make an "official" claim.  i just thought it was interesting, if somewhat alarming.  in my gut, i got the sense that this was a "scanning probe" of some sort. this is pure speculation on my part, and i cannot even identify precisely what lies behind this association in my mind.
perhaps it is due to the slow, descending, side-to-side movement of the object.

incidentally, my husband and i are amateur astronomers who own a 10-inch dobsonian reflector, which we carted out onto the deck only to realize with great dismay that it was impossible for us to obtain a viewing angle from our vantage point on the balcony!  (we toyed with the idea of hauling the telescope downstairs, but by this time the object had descended very low upon the horizon, disappearing from view shortly thereafter.) we are very familiar with many of the objects in the night skies.  we know what satellites, stars, planets, constellations, helicopters and planes look like, and this was certainly none of those.
content.summary: a morphing  triangular object with indistinct edges descending slowly upon the horizon. precise shape of object hard to determine on account of twinkling blue and red lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I honestly don't know where to begin here. putting this up is a little scary for me, because all this stuff really happened. but it's been close to 5 years, i'm getting older and it's time to come forward with my story. let me also say i'd much rather talk to someone about this than type it all out, but i'll do my best.

on saturday may 27th 2006 my girlfriend was away for the day, and i had our apartment to myself. i spent some time playing a new videogame, and had a long phone conversation with my mom. it was probably the deepest conversation we ever had, and she told me a story about my birth. i knew we were both sick when i was born and that she had to have an emergency c section, but apparantly her heart stopped for 45 seconds while under. when she woke up to my father holding a newborn me, all she could do was tell him about the dream she had. she was aboard a flying saucer with a higher power, or jesus, looking for others. but for some reason no one else was ready, or able to board with them. this kinda blew me away, she hesitated my whole life to tell me this because of my profound intrest in the subject.

ok so we finish up the conversation, it's 7:20 pm  and i try to go back to my new game. but instead i put down the controller, got up and looked out the window of my 7th floor apt. and see this white egg shaped god-knows-what right out there. it was about the size of a minivan, maby a small bus and it was so close i could have hit it with a rock. it immediately began moving away very quickly and i noticed two black dots, one on either side of it. they started swirling around the egg and would 'splash' in and out of it, causing it to shimmer black and white so fast it looked silver. it looked kinda like a molecule. 

ok now here's where it gets tough....

i only saw it up close for maby 10 seconds, it flew away pretty fast. but i kept my eye on it and could still see it as a black speck against the clear sky for a good 2 mins. then it started blinking out, and i said outloud "no! come back" and waved it back and this black speck zapped me. it felt like i jumped into ice water and had my brain ripped in half. the sky turned a bright purple, i wanna say ultra-violet and against it were hundreds of different sized transparant white circles, or 'orbs'. like a polka-dot sky. it brought me to my knees and i urinated myself. 

ok here's the part that really scares me, i wouldn't bother coming forward if it weren't for this. when i finally managed to shake it off i heard what sounded like chaos outside- all the car alarms in the whole parking lot, several sirens and what sounded like a fire engine, all blaring loudly for 30 maby 45 seconds. the clock on my cable box said 7:23.

first thing i did was try to call my mom back but the phone was dead for 10 minutes or so. at her advice about an hour later i called the local fire dept. inquiring about the alarms but got some bs answer- a "system alarm test". also i found some neighbors who heard everything at that precise time, but no one saw anything.

i had several other related paranormal experiences that summer, but i'm done typing about this. as i re-read this i realise there's several details i'm leaving out, but i'll always remember that day quite well. i feel mufon is a trusted orginization so please feel free to contact me if you'd like to know more. thank you.
content.summary: A ufo zapped me 5 years ago

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my way to work from south austin when i noticed a brightly colored object in the sky.  i believed it was a plane at first.  when i stopped at a stop sign, i noticed the object moved very quickly and seemed to hover at times.  the object also pulsated between blue and a very bright neon green.  at this point i started recording it with my phone.  the object seemed to speed up and slow down a few times while pulsating the different colors.  it then very quickly moved behind the hills where i could no longer see it.  the video is not very high quality, due to it being recorded on my phone.

[link moved to additional evidence section/cms/tg]  is the video i uploaded.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Pulsating fast moving object

content.detailedDescription: I went out for a smoke when i saw a orange light in the sky dimmer then a star going straight up. a plane was flying by at the same time the object was moving up it came so close to the plane i thought it was going to crash. i offten see helicopters flying around my neighborhood and know that what i saw was not a helicopter, they have a much brighter light then the dim orange ufo i saw. i offten see strange lights appearing and disappearing over highway 99.
content.summary: Bright orange light  traveling straight up. went right past a plane flying by and continued going up then disappeared!

content.detailedDescription:
We were standing outside in our backyard.  we looked up into the sky and saw what appeared to be a boomerang shape of amber lights floating across the sky rather quickly.  the color of the object was dark like the sky but there were numerous amber lights on the bottom of the object.  the object made no noise.  it flew from east to west.  we saw about 10 of these objects in a 20 minute period.  i had some binoculars and could see the lights more clearly with them.  the lights seemed not to be in any particular pattern.

what started this all is that my husband saw the exact same thing last night.  i saw the boomerang object floating over our house quite low tonight and that is when i ran and got my husband and son who both witnessed these objects.  

i was rather shocked that i saw the same thing my husband did last night.
content.summary: Series of amber lights in formation

content.detailedDescription:
I went food shoping just to pick up a couple of things (shoprite) my daughter was in the back she is 4. i was driving towards my home near the river and i just saw this big ,not to me because it was far away but i can see a big circle that was just stationary facing south it was like over silver it was almost white but was silver and the sun was refelective on it at the top was a redish orange color hard to tell because of the sun.The thing that was strange there were no planes in the area i mean i look up all the time and there are always some planes flying by. but the sky was empty i had to make a left towards my house and looked up the sky was empty if it was a plane on a clear day i would still be able to see it going in some sort of direction it was gone.I would say it was about 10 miles south of me.I have never seen a ufo before but have been intrested in the subject for quite some time .My wifes cousin son saw one when i went to pick him up from a teen party he saw 3 red lights moving very fast we were on a bridge driving over water but it was the same area about a year ago i did not see them because i was driving. again the thing that was most strange there were no planes in the area  espically for a saturday but there were none for like 1 hour in the area,also the entire sighting took place in about 30 to forty second but i know what i saw .

i was driving south on fisher blvd
i do not know what it was but it looked like if you took a blimp and looked at it from the front only with no scck-pit and left it stationary.
it was just motionless
my feeling were i was pissed because there was a car behind me and i could not pull over.
i lost sight because i had to make a left turn.As soon as i could stop i did and it was gone.
the direction i was driving in you can almost see it in plain sight and then look a little up.
content.summary: Silver circle like almost white with not moving then just gone
